00057 /* SETUP request, direction of data stage */
00058 #define USB_SETUP_DIR_OUT       0               
00059 #define USB_SETUP_DIR_IN        1               
00060 #define USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK      0x80            
00061 #define USB_SETUP_DIR_D2H       0x80            
00062 #define USB_SETUP_DIR_H2D       0x00            
00064 /* SETUP request type */

00066 #define USB_SETUP_TYPE_CLASS          1         
00067 #define USB_SETUP_TYPE_VENDOR         2         
00068 #define USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK  0x00      
00069 #define USB_SETUP_TYPE_CLASS_MASK     0x20      
00070 #define USB_SETUP_TYPE_VENDOR_MASK    0x40

00074 #define USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_INTERFACE 1         
00075 #define USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_ENDPOINT  2         
00076 #define USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_OTHER     3

00081 #define SET_FEATURE               3             
00082 #define SET_ADDRESS               5             
00083 #define GET_DESCRIPTOR            6

00086 #define SET_CONFIGURATION         9             
00087 #define GET_INTERFACE             10            
00088 #define SET_INTERFACE             11            
00089 #define SYNCH_FRAME               12

00255 #define STATIC_CONST_STRING_DESC( _name, ... )                  \
00256 EFM32_PACK_START( 1 )                                           \
00257 typedef struct                                                  \
00258 {                                                               \
00259   uint8_t  len;                                                 \
00260   uint8_t  type;                                                \
00261   char16_t name[ 1 + sizeof( (char16_t[]){__VA_ARGS__} ) / 2];  \
00262 } __attribute__ ((packed)) _##_name;                            \
00263 EFM32_PACK_END()                                                \
00264 EFM32_ALIGN( 4 )                                                \
00265 EFM32_PACK_START( 1 )                                           \
00266 static const _##_name _name __attribute__ ((aligned(4)))=       \
00267 {                                                               \
00268   .len  = sizeof( _##_name ) - 2,                               \
00269   .type = USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR,                                \
00270   .name = {__VA_ARGS__},                                        \
00271   .name[ ( ( sizeof( _##_name ) - 2 ) / 2 ) - 1 ] = '\0'        \
00272 }                                                               \
00273 EFM32_PACK_END()
00274 
00278 #define STATIC_CONST_STRING_DESC_LANGID( _name, x, y )      \
00279 EFM32_PACK_START( 1 )                                       \
00280 typedef struct                                              \
00281 {                                                           \
00282   uint8_t len;                                              \
00283   uint8_t type;                                             \
00284   uint8_t name[ 2 ];                                        \
00285 } __attribute__ ((packed)) _##_name;                        \
00286 EFM32_PACK_END()                                            \
00287 EFM32_ALIGN( 4 )                                            \
00288 EFM32_PACK_START( 1 )                                       \
00289 static const _##_name _name __attribute__ ((aligned(4)))=   \
00290 {                                                           \
00291   .len = 4,                                                 \
00292   .type = USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR,                            \
00293   .name = { y, x }                                          \
00294 }                                                           \
00295 EFM32_PACK_END()
00296

00303 #define STATIC_UBUF( x, y ) EFM32_ALIGN( 4 ) static uint8_t x[((y)+3)&~3]
00304 #else
00305 #define        UBUF( x, y ) uint8_t x[((y)+3)&~3] __attribute__ ((aligned(4)))

00375 typedef struct
00376 {
00377   union
00378   {
00379     struct
00380     {
00381       union
00382       {
00383         struct
00384         {
00385           uint8_t Recipient : 5;                
00386           uint8_t Type      : 2;                
00387           uint8_t Direction : 1;                
00388         };
00389         uint8_t bmRequestType;                  
00390       };
00391       uint8_t   bRequest;                       
00392       uint16_t  wValue;                         
00393       uint16_t  wIndex;                         
00394       uint16_t  wLength;                        
00395     };
00396     uint32_t  dw[2];
00397   };

00581 /* Hardware constraint, do not change. */
00582 #define MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS  14
00583 
00584 /* The DMA engine use one FIFO ram word for each host channel. */
00585 #define MAX_HOST_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS (512-MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS)/*Unit is 4 bytes*/

00841 /*** -------------------- HOST mode API definitions ---------------------- ***/

00843 #define USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT_NONE     -1       
00844 #define USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY_LOW  0        
00845 #define USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY_HIGH 1        
00848 typedef enum
00849 {
00850   H_EP_IDLE             = 0,                      
00851   H_EP_SETUP            = 1,                      
00852   H_EP_DATA_IN          = 2,                      
00853   H_EP_DATA_OUT         = 3,                      
00854   H_EP_STATUS_IN        = 4,                      
00855   H_EP_STATUS_OUT       = 5,                      
00856 } USBH_EpState_TypeDef;
00857 
00858

00863 {
00864   USB_Setup_TypeDef               setup;

00881   uint32_t                        remaining;

00901 
00905 typedef struct
00906 {
00907   uint32_t                  rxFifoSize;     
00908   uint32_t                  nptxFifoSize;   
00909   uint32_t                  ptxFifoSize;    
00910   uint32_t                  reserved;       
00911 } USBH_Init_TypeDef;
00912 
00913 
00916 /* In DMA mode the total available FIFO space is smaller.       */
00917 /* The DMA controller use one FIFO word pr. channel for status. */
00918 /* The unit in the table is byte.                               */
00919 #define USBH_INIT_DEFAULT                                                    \
00920 {                                                                            \
00921   MAX_HOST_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS * 2,/* 1024 bytes Rx FIFO size.             */  \
00922   MAX_HOST_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS,    /* 512 bytes non-periodic Tx FIFO size. */  \
00923   MAX_HOST_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS,    /* 512 bytes periodic Tx FIFO size.     */  \
00924   0                              /* Reserved.                            */  \
00925 }
00926
